about_the_game:
Survive and Change is a game about evolution, taking place in a microscopic world twisted by sources of unknown power. It leads to an ever-changing world where the players immerse themselves as cellular creatures and thrive through the consumption of other creatures.

Control Your Destiny

In Survive and Change, you control an organism in an environment. Your goal is to dominate other organisms by surviving and evolving. Various dangerous and predatory organisms roam the environment searching for food. The success of your creature depends on your evolution choices.

Explore The Water Biome

In the Water Biome, you swim through a watery tropical environment to find food and dominate other organisms to evolve. During evolution, a menu appears where you control the organism type, the organism’s name, mouthpart, body part and abilities. Your goal is to make the right evolution choices enabling you to dominate all organisms.

Current Features

  • Learn the basics with a tutorial
  • Control an organism and survive in the environment
  • Search for food and creatures
  • Explore the water biome
  • Make the right evolution choices to make your organism more dominant

short_description: Survive and Change is a fantasy-based survival evolution game located in a twisted world where strange creatures roam around and consume each other. In order to survive, you must craft yourself into a weapon through careful evolutionary choices. Can you do it though?
